non-resident.translation[0].definitions[: someone who does not live permanently in a particular country or area
A lot of houses in the area are being bought by non-residents.
someone who is not staying in a particular hotel
The hotel restaurant is open to non-residents.
non-resident.translation[1].definitions[: someone who for tax purposes is not considered as living permanently in a particular country
real estate bought through offshore companies under a system used by non-residents
